title: Looking for champions that have the most diversity in their roles!
body:
So, I'm trying to figure out the best champions for multiple roles.  Preferably ones that can be competitive by mid-game in at least 4/5 of the roles. (5/5 would be great, but more difficult given the difference between mid and adc.) - I am not seeking to do ranked with this, I often play in casual drafted and am simply curious of the options out there for it.  I understand most champions, if brought into 4 different roles, will likely have to play safer than usual to survive in some lanes.  The most I want out of the pick is to be able to survive in the lane until one can get the items to be competitive, and not be outright considered a troll pick. 

Atm I'm testing Kayle out.  She is good in top lane, decent in mid, okay in jungle and is possible as a support, but her ADC game seems to be lacking pretty considerably given her very weak early game and she can't be a very competitive jungle(in most cases) do to the weak start as well. 

Thoughts and suggestions are all welcome!

replies.body: Thanks for all the suggestions!  I'll definitely be trying all these out. ^^

Lulu can play pretty much any lane except Jng.
Naut can do pretty much anything except Bot.
Irelia all except Supp, though bot would typically be a kill lane rather than traditional support).
Pyke can do all, but again you'd be looking at a kill lane bot. (Not sure he's still viable in Jng tho).

Ezreal: Can be played as an ADC, AP support, AP midlane, kite/poke toplane.
Varus: ADC, midlane, top

Almost every adc can go ADC, mid, and top.

Annie: Mid, support, top
So Kayle, Teemo, and possibly Vayne are three characters I've been suggested so far!
Teemo. everything works bar adc. (adc works but is bad compared to other champions)
I heard that as well, I was considering giving it a shot.  I need to get better at his playstyle.
